lead_paragraph: A report expanded on findings by experts who have noted an alarming rise in some types of hate crimes tied to the vitriol of the presidential race and recent terrorist attacks.

headline.print_headline: Attacks Against Muslim Americans Fueled Rise in Hate Crime, F.B.I. Says
headline.main: U.S. Hate Crimes Surge 6%, Fueled by Attacks on Muslims

snippet: A report expanded on findings by experts who have noted an alarming rise in some types of hate crimes tied to the vitriol of the presidential race and recent terrorist attacks....
